private static void epiAppyAll_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) { EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string PntColor = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"].ToString(); edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"]=PntColor; oTrans.Update() ;
int OrderNo = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int CustNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["CustNum"]);
if (PntColor != "") {
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false);
CallApplyallDynamicQuery(OrderNo,CustNum, PntColor);
oTrans.PushStatusText("", false); Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default; } }
private static void CallApplyallDynamicQuery(int OrderNo, int CustNum, string PntColor) { try { // Declare and Initialize EpiDataView Variables // Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
// Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
string OrderN = OrderNo.ToString(); string BAQName = "Order_PaintablePartQRY"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNo);
// Lets Loop through our results if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) {
foreach (DataRow Qry in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
string OrderPart = Qry["Part_PartNum"].ToString(); int OrderLn = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_OrderLine"]); bool Paintable = Convert.ToBoolean(Qry["Part_CheckBox01"]);
if (dsSalesOrder != null) {
foreach (DataRow item in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows)
{ if (item["PartNum"].ToString() == OrderPart && Convert.ToInt32(item["OrderLine"]) == OrderLn ) {
item.BeginEdit(); item["CheckBox01"] = Paintable; item["ShortChar02"] = PntColor; item["RowMod"] ="U"; item. EndEdit(); }
}
}
} }
adapterSalesOrder.Update();
oTrans.Refresh() ; adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default;
adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
private static void epiPntMtl_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) { EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string PntColor = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"].ToString();
int OrderNo = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int CustNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["CustNum"]);
if (PntColor != "") {
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false); CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOrderDtlMethod(OrderNo, CustNum); oTrans.PushStatusText("", false);
}
}
private static void CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOrderDtlMethod(int OrderNum, int CustNum) { try {
SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
string BAQName;
//Get customer information
string CustNo = CustNum.ToString(); BAQName = "CustomerQuoteINFO";
Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds1 = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds1.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("CustNum", CustNo, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A"); adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds1);
if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { foreach (DataRow Cust in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) { CustomerCustID = Convert.ToInt32(Cust["Customer_CustID"]); TerritoryID = Cust["Customer_TerritoryID"].ToString(); CustomerName = Cust["Customer_Name"].ToString(); QuoteNumCurrencyCode ="USD"; TerritoryIDTerritoryDesc = Cust["SalesTer_TerritoryDesc"].ToString(); DiscountPercent = Cust["Customer_DiscountPercent"].ToString();
} }
//============================================ //Select all the paint material for the order
string OrderNo = OrderNum.ToString(); BAQName = "Order_PaintPartNum4";//Order_PaintPartNum4
Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds2 = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds2.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderNo, "string", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds2); int RecCount = adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count;
if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { foreach (DataRow item in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) { PartRev = item["PartRev_RevisionNum"].ToString(); PartNum = item["Part_PartNum"].ToString(); IUM = item["Part_IUM"].ToString(); PUM = item["Part_PUM"].ToString(); ProdCode = item["Part_ProdCode"].ToString(); UnitPrice = Convert.ToDouble(item["Part_UnitPrice"]); PricePerCode = item["Part_PricePerCode"].ToString(); QtyBearing = Convert.ToDouble(item["Part_QtyBearing"]); PartDescription = item["Part_PartDescription"].ToString(); SellingFactor = Convert.ToInt32(item["Part_SellingFactor"]); SalesUM = item["Part_SalesUM"].ToString(); ProdCodDesc = item["ProdGrup_Description"].ToString(); TypeCode = item["Part_TypeCode"].ToString();
//Check if part exist bool PartCheck = CheckPaintPartExist(PartNum, OrderNum);
if(!PartCheck ) {
string partNum = PartNum ; bool lSubstitutePartExist = false; bool lIsPhantom = false; string uomCode = ""; System.Guid sysRowID = System.Guid.Empty; string rowType = String.Empty; bool salesKitView = false; bool removeKitComponents = false; bool suppressUserPrompts = false; bool getPartXRefInfo = false; bool checkPartRevisionChange = false; bool checkChangeKitParent = false; string cDeleteComponentsMessage = ""; string questionString = String.Empty; string cWarningMessage = String.Empty; bool multipleMatch = false; bool promptToExplodeBOM = false; string cConfigPartMessage = String.Empty; string cSubPartMessage = String.Empty; string explodeBOMerrMessage = String.Empty; string cMsgType = String.Empty; bool multiSubsAvail = false; bool runOutQtyAvail = false;
bool result54 = adapterSalesOrder.GetByID(OrderNum);
bool result = adapterSalesOrder.GetNewOrderDtl(OrderNum);
bool result2 = adapterSalesOrder.ChangePartNumMaster(ref partNum, ref lSubstitutePartExist, ref lIsPhantom, ref uomCode, sysRowID, rowType, salesKitView, removeKitComponents, suppressUserPrompts, getPartXRefInfo, checkPartRevisionChange, checkChangeKitParent, out cDeleteComponentsMessage, out questionString, out cWarningMessage, out multipleMatch, out promptToExplodeBOM, out cConfigPartMessage, out cSubPartMessage, out explodeBOMerrMessage, out cMsgType, out multiSubsAvail, out runOutQtyAvail);
//Add new detail line if (result) {
DataRow dr = adapterSalesOrder.SalesOrderData.OrderDtl[adapterSalesOrder.SalesOrderData.OrderDtl.Rows.Count - 1];
dr["OrderNum"] = OrderNum; dr["OrderLine"] = 0; dr["OpenLine"] = true; dr["VoidLine"] = false; dr["LineType"] = "PART"; dr["OrderNum"] = OrderNum; dr["IUM"] = IUM; dr["LineType"] = "PART"; dr["OrderNum"] = OrderNum; dr["IUM"] = IUM; dr["ProdCodeDescription"] = ProdCodDesc ; dr["PartNum"] = PartNum; dr["LineDesc"] = PartDescription; dr["RevisionNum"] = PartRev; dr["PartNumPartDescription"] = PartDescription; dr["UnitPrice"] = UnitPrice ; dr["OrderQty"] = 1; dr["MktgCampaignIDCampDescription"] = "Default"; dr["DocUnitPrice"] = UnitPrice; dr["DiscountPercent"] = DiscountPercent; dr["ProdCode"] = ProdCode; dr["PricePerCode"] = PricePerCode; dr["PartNumPartDescription"] = PartDescription; dr["PartNumSalesUM"] = IUM; dr["PartNumSellingFactor"] = SellingFactor; dr["PartNumIUM"] = IUM; dr["PartNumSalesUM"] = IUM; dr["CustNumCustID"] = CustomerCustID; dr["CustNumName"] = CustomerName; dr["CustNum"] = CustNum; dr["OrderNumBTCustNum"] = CustNum; dr["OrderNumCurrencyCode"] ="USD"; dr["RowMod"] = "A";
adapterSalesOrder.Update();
}
}
} }
oTrans.Refresh() ;
adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose(); adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
//-------------------------------------------------- //Check is part already exist in the order private static bool CheckPaintPartExist(string PartNum, int OrderNum) { try {
DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
string OrderN = OrderNum.ToString();
string BAQName = "Order_PaintPartEXIST";
Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A"); ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("PartNum", PartNum, "string", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { return true; }
adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();
return false;
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); return false; } }
private static void epiPaintQty_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) { try { // Declare and Initialize EpiDataView Variables // Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
string BAQName;
EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string PntColor = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"].ToString(); double PaintQty = 0.0;
int OrderNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int CustNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["CustNum"]);
if (PntColor != "") {
Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false);
string OrderNo = OrderNum.ToString();
BAQName = "OrderPaintPartMtl_QRY"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderNo, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
// Select all the paint materials and create a quote line for each
if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { foreach (DataRow item in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
PartNum = item["Part_PartNum"].ToString();;
PaintQty = TotalPaintQty(item["Part_PartDescription"].ToString(),OrderNum)/1000;
CallOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(OrderNum, PartNum,Math.Round(PaintQty, 2) );
}
} adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose(); oTrans.PushStatusText("", false); Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default; }
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
private static double TotalPaintQty(string PaintColor, int OrderNum) { try { // Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect(); double TotalArea = 0; string OrderN = OrderNum.ToString();
string BAQName = "OrderDtl_QRY"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A"); ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("Color", PaintColor, "string", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
// Lets Loop through our results if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { foreach (DataRow item in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
TotalArea = TotalArea + (System.Convert.ToDouble(item["Calculated_LineTotal"])); }
}
adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();
return TotalArea;
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); return 0; } }
private static void CallOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(int QuoteNum, string PartNum, double PaintQty) { try { SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
int intId = QuoteNum;
// Call Adapter method System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(intId);
if (dsSalesOrder != null) {
foreach (DataRow item in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows)
{ if (item["PartNum"].ToString() == PartNum) {
item.BeginEdit(); item["SellingQuantity"] = PaintQty;
item["RowMod"] = "U"; item. EndEdit();
adapterSalesOrder.Update(); }
}
}
oTrans.Refresh() ;
adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }

private static void epiFreightBtn_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) {
Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false); EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string FreightCarrier = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar11"].ToString(); string SelectedState = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar12"].ToString();
int OrderNo = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int OrderLn = 0;
oTrans.Update(); string PartNum = "Freight"; double FreightCost; double OrderTotalWt = GetOrderTotalWeight(OrderNo);
EnterOrderWeight(OrderNo, OrderTotalWt);
FreightCost = GetCarrierRate(FreightCarrier, SelectedState, OrderTotalWt);
CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOHOrderMscMethod(OrderNo,OrderLn, Math.Round(FreightCost, 2) );
oTrans.PushStatusText("", false);
Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default; }
private static double GetOrderTotalWeight(int OrderNum) { try { // Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
double TotalArea = 0; string OrderN = OrderNum.ToString();

private static void CallDynamicQueryPainLn(int OrderNum, int CustNum, string PntColor, int DisplaySeq) { try { Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
// EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("QuoteDtl");
SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
int MinSeq = DisplaySeq; int MaxSeq = DisplaySeq + 1; string LineN = DisplaySeq.ToString(); string OrderN = OrderNum.ToString(); string BAQName = "PaintablePartLine_Order"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("LineSeq", LineN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNum);
// Lets Loop through our results if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) {
foreach (DataRow Qry in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
string OrderPart = Qry["Part_PartNum"].ToString(); int OrderLn = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_OrderLine"]); bool Paintable = Convert.ToBoolean(Qry["Part_CheckBox01"]); int LnSeq = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_DisplaySeq"]);
if (dsSalesOrder != null) { foreach (DataRow dr in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows) { if (dr["PartNum"].ToString() == OrderPart && Convert.ToInt32(dr["OrderLine"]) == OrderLn && Convert.ToInt32(dr["DisplaySeq"])== LnSeq ) { //MessageBox.Show(OrderPart); dr.BeginEdit(); dr["CheckBox01"] = true; dr["ShortChar02"] = PntColor; dr["RowMod"] ="U"; dr.EndEdit(); adapterSalesOrder.Update();
} }
}
} }
oTrans.Refresh() ; adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose(); adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default;
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
